Package helper

Class DateTimeProcessor

java.lang.Object
helper.DateTimeProcessor
public class DateTimeProcessor extends Object
Holds methods for converting time.

      public static LocalDateTime toLDT(LocalDate date, String hours, String minutes)
      Converts a LocalDate and time in hours and minutes to a LocalDateTime object.
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDate to convert.
      hours - The hours to use for the converted LocalDateTime.
      minutes - The minutes to use for the converted LocalDateTime.
      Returns:
      The resulting LocalDateTime object.
